ministry.name: Video Ministry
ministry.overview: The Video Production Ministry is part of "Calvary Continuum", the broadcast arm of the Multi-Media Ministry.

long-description.p: The Video Production Ministry is part of "Calvary Continuum", the broadcast arm of the Multi-Media Ministry. The Video Production Ministry produces special event videos and a weekly cable access show Calvary Continuum, on 1 p.m. Saturdays, found on Channel 11.
